zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理中，短期区间波动]
zh.content:
当前ETH/USD的价格表现出震荡整理的趋势。最新价格为2292.95美元，较24小时变化（+1.59%）保持一定的波动性。虽然价格略微上涨，但仍维持在较小区间内波动，未能突破前期的高点2309.73美元。

从技术指标来看，RSI（14）未给出明确信号，说明市场动能不强。MACD值为负（-11.46485），显示短期内卖压较重，但因信号线数据缺失，暂时难以确认明确的趋势变化。SMA（20）处于2317.47美元，价格当前在此均线下方，进一步验证短期内价格承压。

支撑位位于2252.68美元附近，这是最近的低点，若价格下行至此区间，可能会引发进一步的支撑反弹。上行阻力在2309.73美元，若突破该位置，则有可能迎来更大的上行空间。投资者应密切关注这些关键价位的突破情况。

基于当前震荡走势，短期内建议采取区间交易策略，逢低买入，逢高卖出。避免在没有明确突破的情况下进行大幅度操作，等待更清晰的趋势信号出现。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum has shown a moderate uptrend, with the latest price at 2292.95, up by 1.59% over the last 24 hours. Despite this positive momentum, the price remains well below the 20-period simple moving average (SMA) of 2317.47, indicating some resistance. A sustained price above this level could indicate a continuation of the upward trend, while failure to break through might signal a potential retracement. Investors should closely watch for a breakout or failure at the SMA, as it serves as a key short-term pivot point.

In terms of support, the low for the day at 2252.68 offers immediate protection. If Ethereum revisits this level, it could act as a strong support zone, with buyers potentially stepping in to push the price back up. On the upside, resistance is clearly observed near the recent high of 2309.73. A break above this level could expose Ethereum to further upside, targeting the next key resistance at around 2350, based on historical price action. Traders may look for price action confirmation at these levels before deciding on entry points.

The MACD currently shows a negative value at -11.46, suggesting bearish momentum in the short term. However, with no clear signal line available, it’s difficult to gauge the strength or direction of potential reversal. Traders should monitor the MACD closely for any crossovers or divergence signals that could offer more clarity on the upcoming market direction. A bullish MACD crossover above the signal line would be a strong signal for buyers to re-enter the market.

Considering the current market setup, a cautious trading approach is advised. Traders may want to wait for either a confirmed break above resistance at 2317 or a bounce off support at 2252 before making any major moves. With limited indicators available, focusing on key price levels and potential breakouts will help in managing risk while navigating Ethereum's short-term fluctuations.
